description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2022-Sep-12 02:37:17

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

AssetStatus.description: Indicates current 'In Use' status of the Asset connected to the telemetry device

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: Current status of the Asset is unknown.

oneOf.title: Available
oneOf.description: Asset is currently NOT in use but is ready for use.

oneOf.title: Locked
oneOf.description: Asset is currently locked out and cannot be used until a Technician/Supervisor/RME verifies asset is operational.

oneOf.title: LockedToBeVerified
oneOf.description: Asset is currently locked out awaiting review from onsite Technician/Supervisor/RME.

oneOf.title: LockedVerified
oneOf.description: Asset is currently locked out and an onsite Technician/Supervisor/RME has verified the Asset is not operational and requires service/repair.

oneOf.title: OutOfService
oneOf.description: Asset is currently out of service, awaiting service/repair.

AccessLevel.description: Indicates level of telemetry system access to the Truck / Asset.

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: No access is defined for this operator. For example the operator is yet to login to the system.

oneOf.title: Operator
oneOf.description: Asset / Truck can be operated as normal.

oneOf.title: Technician
oneOf.description: A level above Operator Access. Technician can unlock an Asset / Truck tagged out of service and may have further privileges above Operator Access, allowing them to perform work on a Truck/Asset unimpeded.

oneOf.title: Supervisor
oneOf.description: A level above Operator access. Supervisor can unlock an Asset / Truck tagged out of service and may have different privileges to Technician Access.

oneOf.title: RME
oneOf.description: Reliability Maintenance Engineer Access. A level above Operator access. Supervisor can unlock an Asset / Truck tagged out of service and may have further privileges above Technician and/or Supervisor Access.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

SessionType.description: Specifies the type of session for the asset status event.

oneOf.title: NormalSession
oneOf.description: Session where ID interlock was passed normally

oneOf.title: InterlocksBypassSession
oneOf.description: Session where ID interlock was bypassed.
